intro: Actinostemma tenerum var. yunnanense, commonly known as Yunnan starflower, is a flowering plant native to the mountainous regions of Yunnan Province in China. It belongs to the family Polygonaceae, which includes plants commonly known as buckwheats. The plant is characterized by its delicate, star-shaped flowers that bloom in early summer. It typically grows in rocky or forested areas at high altitudes. Its leaves are lanceolate and covered with fine hairs, giving it a soft, textured appearance.
